definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Can a female having her menstrual cycle adjust other people?
sentences.chinese: 女性生理期可以帮别人调整吗？

sentences.english: Second lack of exercise does not suggest a big exteriors.
sentences.chinese: 生理期不建议新娘出大外景。

sentences.english: I think it's that time of the month.
sentences.chinese: 我想它这个月的生理期又到了。

sentences.english: If you are in menses or catch a cold, please let the teacher know.
sentences.chinese: 如果处于生理期或感冒，请于课前告知授课教师。

sentences.english: Three physiological period do not suggest the bride out great exteriors.
sentences.chinese: 生理期不建议新娘出大外景。

sentences.english: Can a female take Longevitology class when she is pregnant or having her menstrual cycle?
sentences.chinese: 女性怀孕或生理期可以学习长生学吗？

definition: to stop menstruating (as a result of pregnancy, menopause or medical condition etc)
